projects.title: SemiKolan Blogs
projects.description: Care4Covid is a Realtime Statistical Website for Analysis of Covid-19 (Sars-Cov-2). It is an attempt to help people stay updated with the Covid-19 Analytics.

projects.title: Instalyzer
projects.description: Instalyzer is an application enabling you to search through Instagram's content providing additional functionalities.

projects.title: SemiKolan
projects.description: Semikolan is a Platform for like minded Learners, Developers and Enthusiasts to Learn, Connect, create great connections and work on various Open-Source projects. SemiKolan is a Community For the Developers, By the Developers, To the Developers
